mapper.sql: ID,MNAME, UPPDER_ID, NLEVEL, SYSTEM_ID, NINDEX, BC_FLAG, PAGE, PIC, NAMEPY, NAMEWB, REMARK, UPD_USER, UPD_TIME, CRT_USER, CRT_TIME
mapper.select: select ifnull(MAX(NINDEX),0)+1 maxNindex from sys_menu where UPPDER_ID = #{faMenuId,jdbcType=VARCHAR};

SELECT a.ID,a.MNAME, a.UPPDER_ID, a.NLEVEL, a.SYSTEM_ID, a.NINDEX, a.BC_FLAG, a.PAGE, a.PIC, a.NAMEPY, a.NAMEWB, a.REMARK, a.UPD_USER, a.UPD_TIME, a.CRT_USER, a.CRT_TIME, ifnull(b.MNAME,'父级') FATHER_MNAME FROM sys_menu a LEFT JOIN sys_menu b on a.UPPDER_ID=b.ID WHERE a.UPPDER_ID ='0' AND a.ID IN ( SELECT DISTINCT srm.MENU_ID MENU_ID FROM( SELECT sor.ROLE_ID FROM sys_oper_role sor WHERE sor.LOGINCODE = #{logincode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) rli LEFT JOIN ( SELECT srmm.MENU_ID,srmm.LOGINCODE FROM sys_right_modset srmm WHERE srmm.OBJFLAG = 2 ) srm ON rli.ROLE_ID = srm.LOGINCODE WHERE MENU_ID IS NOT NULL ) ORDER BY CAST(a.NINDEX AS DECIMAL) ASC;

SELECT a.ID MENU_ID FROM sys_menu a LEFT JOIN sys_menu b on a.UPPDER_ID=b.ID WHERE a.ID IN ( SELECT DISTINCT srm.MENU_ID MENU_ID FROM( SELECT sor.ROLE_ID FROM sys_oper_role sor WHERE sor.LOGINCODE = #{logincode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) rli LEFT JOIN ( SELECT srmm.MENU_ID,srmm.LOGINCODE FROM sys_right_modset srmm WHERE srmm.OBJFLAG = 2 ) srm ON rli.ROLE_ID = srm.LOGINCODE WHERE MENU_ID IS NOT NULL ) ORDER BY CAST(a.NINDEX AS DECIMAL) ASC;
